title: Texas Public Information Act Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Ava Rose Popielarczyk (September 16, 2023)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act (Texas Government Code, Chapter 552), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Ava Rose Popielarczyk on or about September 16, 2023, by the Texas Tech Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Texas Tech Police Department personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Ava Rose Popielarczyk.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred around 12:00 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 10:30 PM on September 15, 2023, to 2:30 AM on September 16, 2023.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, applying only the minimum redactions required under Texas law to preserve the complete factual record.

If any footage is withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation citing the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Texas Public Information Act Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane (November 18, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act (Texas Government Code, Chapter 552), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane on or about November 18, 2024, by the Garland Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Garland Police Department personnel during the investigation, detention, pursuit (if applicable), and arrest of Keyonna Desirhae Lane.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the investigation, pursuit, or detention.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred around 12:00 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 10:30 PM on November 17, 2024, to 2:30 AM on November 18, 2024.

I respectfully request that the footage be provided in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, with only the minimum redactions necessary under Texas law to preserve the full and accurate depiction of the events.

If any footage is withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation identifying the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Texas Public Information Act Request: Body-Worn and Dash Camera Footage – Arrest of Sophia Singler (June 8, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act (Texas Government Code, Chapter 552), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Sophia Singler on or about June 8, 2024, by the Little Elm Police Department.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Little Elm Police Department personnel during the traffic stop, pursuit, investigation, detention, and arrest of Sophia Singler.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the stop, pursuit, or detention.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred at approximately 12:00 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 10:30 PM on June 7, 2024, to 2:30 AM on June 8, 2024.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, with only the least restrictive redactions necessary under Texas law to ensure the completeness and factual integrity of the records.

If any footage is withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation identifying the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Brenden David Morgan (December 20, 2024)

communications.subject: Indiana Access to Public Records Act Request: Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Brenden David Morgan (December 20, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Brenden David Morgan on or about December 20, 2024.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Wilmette Police Department personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Brenden David Morgan.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred at approximately 9:26 PM, I request responsive footage from approximately 8:00 PM to 11:30 PM on December 20, 2024.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, with only the least restrictive redactions necessary under Illinois law, to ensure the full and accurate factual record is maintained.

If any portions of the footage are withheld or redacted, please provide a detailed written explanation citing the specific statutory exemptions relied upon.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your attention to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Adrian Kadareon Shanklin (January 12, 2025)

communications.subject: Indiana Access to Public Records Act Request: Indiana Access to Public Records Act (APRA) Request: Body-Worn Camera Footage – Arrest of Adrian Kadareon Shanklin (January 12, 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act (Indiana Code § 5-14-3), I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) footage related to the arrest of Adrian Kadareon Shanklin on or about January 12, 2025.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by any Lafayette Police Department personnel during the detention, investigation, or arrest of Adrian Kadareon Shanklin.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred at approximately 2:34 AM, I request responsive footage from approximately 1:30 AM to 4:30 AM on January 12, 2025.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, applying only the minimum redactions necessary under applicable law to maintain the full and accurate factual record.

If any footage is withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation identifying the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your attention to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
